game.name: Super Scary Stacker
game.description:
Step into the graveyard where only the undead survive and get ready to play with some undead shapes in the super popular Super Scary Stacker! You cannot keep yourself away until you finish all the levels of this brand new fun puzzle stacking game that features a wonderful and spooky Halloween theme. Your objective is to stack different scary shapes on top of each other. There is no need to be scared of these spooky objects but they are available to entertain you for hours. 
Make sure that the stack of multiple spooky objects can hold for a particular amount of time without falling over. Get ready to deal with a wider collection of Halloween shapes that range from the triangular pumpkins to hexagonal monsters and square blood-thirsty zombies in this HTML5 puzzzle game! Try to stack the blocks with as much precision as you can within as minimum time as possible to complete your stack successfully! Keep your eyes on the screen to know where to stack the next objects!
Put your logical mind to test to stack them together to prepare a stable stack structure in this cool Halloween game! There are 50 unique and challenging levels to play that ensures you to offer a huge amount of fun to players from different age groups. The theme of this awesome puzzle challenge is very cool while the sounds and gameplay are extremely brilliant. Give this a try to know how many spooky objects you can stack in time! Good luck to build the best towers in the history!
